xocs:funding.xocs:funding-agency: Fundação para a Ciência e a Tecnologia

xocs:funding-list.xocs:funding-text: This work was supported by Portuguese funds through the CIDMA—Center for Research and Development in Mathematics and Applications, and the Portuguese Foundation for Science and Technology ("FCT–Fundação para a Ciência e a Tecnologia"), within Project UID/MAT/ 0416/2013.

head.abstracts: © 2016, Springer International Publishing.We study the problem of compressed sensing for quaternionic Fourier matrices as arising in color representation of images. We will show that such matrices are allowing a sparse reconstruction by means of an l1-minimization with high probability. Examples of sparse sampling of color images are provided.

grant.grant-agency: Fundação para a Ciência e a Tecnologia

coredata.dc:description: We study the problem of compressed sensing for quaternionic Fourier matrices as arising in color representation of images. We will show that such matrices are allowing a sparse reconstruction by means of an l1-minimization with high probability. Examples of sparse sampling of color images are provided.
coredata.dc:title: Compressed Sensing for Quaternionic Signals
